title: What Donald Trump thinks about JD Vance's 'childless cat ladies' comment
content: ​Amid speculations that former president Donald Trump, the Republican nominee for the president, may replace JD Vance as Vance emerged as a controversial figure because of what he said and believed, Trump said Vance just loves family and there is nothing wrong in saying that. But Trump's feelings about 'childless cat ladies' are not so strong as he said he thinks not having children is "just as good" as having a family.
summary: ​Amid speculations that former president Donald Trump, the Republican nominee for the president, may replace JD Vance as Vance emerged as a controversial figure because of what he said and believed, Trump said Vance just loves family and there is nothing wrong in saying that. But Trump's feelings about 'childless cat ladies' are not so strong as he said he thinks not having children is "just as good" as having a family.

title: Gaza health ministry declares territory 'polio epidemic area'
content: The health ministry in Hamas-run Gaza has declared the Palestinian territory a "polio epidemic area," accusing Israel's military campaign of destroying health infrastructure, which it says led to the recurrence of the virus. Israel's campaign has killed 39,400 people so far in Gaza, according to the health ministry in the Hamas-run territory, which does not provide details of civilian and militant deaths.
summary: The health ministry in Hamas-run Gaza has declared the Palestinian territory a "polio epidemic area," accusing Israel's military campaign of destroying health infrastructure, which it says led to the recurrence of the virus. Israel's campaign has killed 39,400 people so far in Gaza, according to the health ministry in the Hamas-run territory, which does not provide details of civilian and militant deaths.

title: Donald Trump atomic crazy, won't vote for him, says nephew: 'He's not racist but...'
content: ​Donald Trump's nephew Fred C Trump III came to news for his tell-all book in which he revealed that his uncle told him to let his disabled son die and then move to Florida. Now he said he would vote for Kamala Harris as Trump is 'atomic crazy' and everyone knows that in the family. But if his uncle wins and he is invited to the inauguration, he said he would attend.
summary: ​Donald Trump's nephew Fred C Trump III came to news for his tell-all book in which he revealed that his uncle told him to let his disabled son die and then move to Florida. Now he said he would vote for Kamala Harris as Trump is 'atomic crazy' and everyone knows that in the family. But if his uncle wins and he is invited to the inauguration, he said he would attend.

title: Lara Trump says Kamala Harris reminds her of designer 'trash bag'
content: Donald Trump's daughter-in-law Lara Trump who is also the co-chair of the Republican National Committee said Kamala Harris reminds her of a designer trash bag. She accused the mainstream media of trying to rewrite history and propping up Kamala Harris as an "amazing political figure". "It reminds me of a bag that a very famous designer designed. This was several years ago and it was literally a trash bag.
summary: Donald Trump's daughter-in-law Lara Trump who is also the co-chair of the Republican National Committee said Kamala Harris reminds her of a designer trash bag. She accused the mainstream media of trying to rewrite history and propping up Kamala Harris as an "amazing political figure". "It reminds me of a bag that a very famous designer designed. This was several years ago and it was literally a trash bag.

title: 'Kamala Harris quieter than electric car': Bill Maher's clip viral. Watch
content: A clip of comedian and commentator Bill Maher shredding vice president Kamala Harris to pieces has gone viral as Kamala's campaign has picked up against Donald Trump a week after President Joe Biden opted out of the presidential race. Bill Maher was one of the loudest voices against Biden contesting the election. But he didn't spare Kamala Harris either as he called Kamala's role as the vice president 'quieter than electric car' in a video.
summary: A clip of comedian and commentator Bill Maher shredding vice president Kamala Harris to pieces has gone viral as Kamala's campaign has picked up against Donald Trump a week after President Joe Biden opted out of the presidential race. Bill Maher was one of the loudest voices against Biden contesting the election. But he didn't spare Kamala Harris either as he called Kamala's role as the vice president 'quieter than electric car' in a video.

title: US elections: Vice President Kamala Harris' campaign attracts record 360,000 volunteers
Race for Harris's running mate narrows as Roy Cooper & Gretchen Whitmer opt out
content: Since vice president Harris emerged as the Democratic frontrunner about a week ago, following President Joe Biden's decision to end his campaign, the crucial choice of a vice presidential nominee has taken center stage. Harris is considering a list of candidates, primarily white males, who could help balance her ticket and broaden her appeal to a larger group of voters.
summary: Since vice president Harris emerged as the Democratic frontrunner about a week ago, following President Joe Biden's decision to end his campaign, the crucial choice of a vice presidential nominee has taken center stage. Harris is considering a list of candidates, primarily white males, who could help balance her ticket and broaden her appeal to a larger group of voters.

title: Protesters target Israeli team at 2024 Paris Olympics, chant ‘heil Hitler’ during match
Australia's foreign minister says Russia-North Korea defense deal is 'risky for the world'
content: Australian Foreign Minister Penny Wong visited the Korean border and criticized the defence pact between North Korea and Russia, calling it destabilizing and risky. She also condemned North Korea's missile tests. Wong met with South Korean officials to discuss countermeasures against North Korea and Russia's military partnership, highlighting concerns over regional security and escalating tensions.
summary: Australian Foreign Minister Penny Wong visited the Korean border and criticized the defence pact between North Korea and Russia, calling it destabilizing and risky. She also condemned North Korea's missile tests. Wong met with South Korean officials to discuss countermeasures against North Korea and Russia's military partnership, highlighting concerns over regional security and escalating tensions.

Pakistan beggar found unconscious with over PKR 5 lakh, Saudi passport in pocket
content: An elderly beggar was discovered unconscious on Khushab Road in Pakistan's Sargodha district with over Rs 0.5 million in his pocket by the Rescue 1122 team. He had PKR 534,000 and a passport showing multiple trips to Saudi Arabia. ​​Upon discharge from the hospital, he retrieved his money and belongings, according to Geo News.
summary: An elderly beggar was discovered unconscious on Khushab Road in Pakistan's Sargodha district with over Rs 0.5 million in his pocket by the Rescue 1122 team. He had PKR 534,000 and a passport showing multiple trips to Saudi Arabia. ​​Upon discharge from the hospital, he retrieved his money and belongings, according to Geo News.

title: Who Is Tim Walz? Minnesota governor stirring interest in Kamala Harris’ VP search
Spain: EU court rules against regional wolf hunting plan
content: The European Court of Justice (ECJ) ruling stipulated that the wolf may not be designated as a species for hunting at a regional level as long as its conservation status at a national level is "unfavorable."
summary: The European Court of Justice (ECJ) ruling stipulated that the wolf may not be designated as a species for hunting at a regional level as long as its conservation status at a national level is "unfavorable."

title: Woman dealing with 'mental health crisis' shot by police after 911 call
content: New Jersey's attorney general has launched an investigation into the fatal shooting of a woman by police in Fort Lee. Responding to a 911 call about a mental health crisis, officers were involved in a confrontation that led to the woman being shot. The incident, which has sparked public outrage, occurred despite the absence of the state's Arrive Together programme in Fort Lee.
summary: New Jersey's attorney general has launched an investigation into the fatal shooting of a woman by police in Fort Lee. Responding to a 911 call about a mental health crisis, officers were involved in a confrontation that led to the woman being shot. The incident, which has sparked public outrage, occurred despite the absence of the state's Arrive Together programme in Fort Lee.

title: Joe Biden proposes sweeping US Supreme Court reforms
content: President Joe Biden proposed reforms to the US Supreme Court to restore public trust. He suggested an 18-year term for justices, a binding ethics code, and a constitutional amendment to limit presidential immunity. Biden criticized recent court decisions eroding public confidence and emphasized that no one, including ex-presidents, is above the law.
summary: President Joe Biden proposed reforms to the US Supreme Court to restore public trust. He suggested an 18-year term for justices, a binding ethics code, and a constitutional amendment to limit presidential immunity. Biden criticized recent court decisions eroding public confidence and emphasized that no one, including ex-presidents, is above the law.
